title: Protonic Nickelate Device Networks for Spatiotemporal Neuromorphic Computing
summary: Computation in biological neural circuits arises from the interplay of nonlinear temporal responses and spatially distributed dynamic network interactions. Replicating this richness in hardware has remained challenging, as most neuromorphic devices emulate only isolated neuron- or synapse-like functions.
